title: woods
description: a dark forest with a slim trail from heavy foot traffic. Infront of you lays an old, single floor cabin with grubby windows and outdated siding.

title: backyard
description: a small patch of flat land covered in short grass and red flowers.

title: living room
description: a welcoming room crowded with places to sit and tacky decorations.

title: large bedroom
description: a spacey bedroom with two full-sized beds and two closets. Neither of them are full

title: bathroom
description: a full bathroom with yellow walls and no windows

title: small bedroom
description: a cramped bedroom thats been torn apart.

title: kitchen
description: a kitchen and dining room with limited space to cook or eat

title: cellar
description: a dank room with poor lighting full of forgotten junk.

title: white suv
description: a pristine Subaru a bumper sticker for Brigham Young University.

title: red pickup truck
description: a rust-colored Ford tuck that belongs to you

title: master bedroom
description: a large room with dark walls and an unmade bed

title: green sedan
description: an old Honda Civic with a dented bumper
